header.title: Easter at Diehtosiida | Sámi University of Applied Sciences

body.p: Welcome to Diehtosiida. Come and see the Govvagiisá photo exhibition, Duoji masterstudents duodji exhibition and Sámi University of Applied Sciences researchers poster exhibition.
10:00 to 15:30 Diehtosiida is open to all.
- Sámi University of Applied Sciences poster exhibition. See what happens here.
- Duodji exhibition by Sámi University of Applied Sciences duodji master students.
Guests can also have a guided tour at Diehtosiida.

p.em: Govvagiisá photo exhibition "Postcard" is open all Easter

body.p: 17:30 Doors and café at Diehtosiida are open 18:00 KIDS PROGRAM – 30 MIN: -‐ Áile ja áhkku (2015), 12’ -‐ Guovssahas oaidná du (2015), 12’ 18:30 YOUTH PROGRAM – 30 MIN: -‐ Eahpáraš (2015), 8’ -‐ Hilbes biigá, Oh Máigon girl (2015), 18’ 19:00 Pause 19:30 EVENING PROGRAM – 90 MIN: -‐ Bihttoš (2014), 14’ -‐ Arctic Superstar (2016), 70’ Ending at ca. 21:00
18:20 Doors and café at Diehtosiida are open

18:30 KIDS PROGRAM – 30 MIN: -‐ Guovssahas oaidná du (2015), 12’ -‐ Bihttoš (2014), 14’ 19:00 EAHKETLEAIKA – 30 MIN: -‐ Vilda duottar (2009), 6’ -‐ Juoigangiehta (2011), 5’ -‐ Sami moment (2011), 5’ -‐ Ellos Sápmi (2015), 12’ 19:30 Pause 20:00 EVENING PROGRAM – 90 min: -‐ Turisteme (2014), 9’ -‐ Sparrooabbán (2016), 68’ -‐ Jahki ii leat jagi viellja (2015), 12’ Ending at ca. 21:30
